scripts.build-all: node ./admin/cmds/update-exports.js && npm run _build-esm && npm run _build-cjs && npm run _dist
scripts._dist-umd: node ./admin/cmds/set-option cjs browser-lang-all && rollup -c && mv ./packages/ethers/dist/ethers.umd.min.js ./packages/ethers/dist/ethers-all.umd.min.js && node ./admin/cmds/set-option cjs && rollup -c
scripts._dist-esm: node ./admin/cmds/set-option esm browser-lang-all && rollup -c --configModule && mv ./packages/ethers/dist/ethers.esm.min.js ./packages/ethers/dist/ethers-all.esm.min.js && node ./admin/cmds/set-option esm && rollup -c --configModule
scripts._dist: npm run _dist-esm && npm run _dist-ancillary && npm run _dist-umd
scripts.test-browser-umd: npm run build-all && npm run _dist-test-umd && npm run _test-browser-umd
scripts.test-browser-esm: npm run build-all && npm run _dist-test-esm && npm run _test-browser-esm
scripts.test: if [ "$TEST" == "" ]; then npm run test-node; else npm run "test-$TEST"; fi
scripts._admin_prepare: npm run clean && npm run bootstrap && npm run build && node ./admin/cmds/update-exports.js
scripts.update-versions: npm run spell-check && npm run _admin_prepare && node ./admin/cmds/update-versions
